cause.description:
The Billionaire Ladies Club is club that encourages young females and, even, older females alike to pursue lifestyles of confidence, class and morality. Many girls in today's society, nationally and internationally, are struggling with the issues of moving forward from past experiences. TBLC will not only encourage girls, but counsel them and give them tools that they will acquire in becoming productive women in today's society. This Organization caters to ages 5 and on.
1. We believe in the existence and purpose of Our Saviour and Lord Jesus Christ. That He died on the cross to save our sins and will soon return to take His church.
2. We will encourage and counsels young ladies to overcome past experiences and move on in strong esteems and confidences.
3. We will provide tools for them to understand and to see and to experience a developing lifestyle of class, confidence and morality.
4. We will provide opportunities for the young ladies to see what they can be and how they can be.
cause.mission: Bring girls to a point where confidence, class and morality are no more issues, but lifestyles.
cause.name: The Billionaire Ladies Club
